name: RXW_DLVRY_COMMNTS
description: Free-text comments entered on a work request providing additional information about how the prescriptions should be delivered. These comments can be entered by a user in Willow Ambulatory.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the work request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DELIVERY_COMMENTS
columns.description: The delivery comments for a given delivery method.
